name: Chrysalis Tarot by Toney Brooks
description:
Discover the enchanting world of the Chrysalis Tarot, a captivating deck designed to awaken your inner wisdom and illuminate your unique path toward personal destiny. Each card is adorned with exquisitely detailed artwork, bringing to life a mesmerizing cast of Otherworld characters and mythological archetypes that serve as your guides on a profound spiritual journey.

Within the Minor Arcana, you'll encounter a delightful troupe of medieval messengers—vibrant figures infused with charm and insight—who inspire and motivate you to chase your dreams and embrace your true potential. The deck’s rich symbolism and intricate imagery provide layers of meaning, inviting both novice and seasoned tarot readers to explore new depths in their readings.

This beautifully crafted set includes 78 thoughtfully designed cards and a comprehensive 60-page guidebook that offers insightful interpretations, helping you unlock the full power of each card. The card stack measures 4 3/4" x 2 7/8" x 1 1/8", making it a perfect companion for both personal reflection and professional readings.

Step into the mystical realm of the Chrysalis Tarot and let its magical energy lead you on a transformative journey of self-discovery and enlightenment.
